text: Gretchen Elizabeth Carlson (born 21 June 1966 in Minnesota) is an American television personality. She performs hosting shows on Fox News. Before that, Carlson received the title of Miss America 1989 (she still works with the Miss America Pageant club). Later she teamed up with CBS News. She joined Fox News around 2005. ==References== ==Other websites== * Fox & Friends Category:Writers from Minnesota Category:American journalists Category:Miss America winners Category:1966 births Category:Living people
title: Gretchen Carlson
